summary: How did tattoos go from something that was put on you to an expression that comes from within you? That transformation is the subject of a new groundbreaking documentary film, TATTOO NATION.
cast: Don Ed Hardy|Freddy Negrete|Travis Barker|Joe Bauman|Miguel Bohigues|Chuco Caballero|Catfish Carl|Mister Cartoon|Charlie Cartwright|Erin Chavez|Tennessee Dave|C.W. Eldridge|Andy Engel|Kore Flatmo|Juan 'Pint' Gonzalez|Kate Hellenbrand|Tim Hendricks|Estevan Herrera|Filip Leu|Mark Mahoney|'Uncle' Mike Martinez|Antonio Mejia|Corey Miller|Eddie Navarette|David Oropeza|Claudia Perez|Placaso|Chuey Quintanar|Chente Rios|Erika Rios|Rich Rios|Bob Roberts|Jack Rudy|Henk Schiffmacher|Carlos Torres|Danny Trejo|Franco Vescovi|James Vigil|Rick Walters
title: Tattoo Nation
